translation: by listening, one attains the stature of siddhas and sages
as well as celestial beings and spiritual masters
by listening, the earth and the sustaining principle are grasped
as well as the vastness of the heavens
by listening, the islands and worlds become known
by listening, one is inwardly nourished and attuned to the vital breath
and attains the state of fearless liberation. ||9||
